column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The other section is the medieval armor collection
column2: which to my dismay has been significantly whittled down and moved upstairs. But still
column3: who can resist the wonder and danger of a time when men were courageous and believed in honor and chivalry--what it meant to actually be a knight in shining armor. Well
column5: but I'm still looking for my knight. I'm a hopeless romantic
